description: Unique identifier for an installer execution detail entry.
Timestamp when the installation process executed on the environment or server.
Application version present before the installation started; likely the source/base version for upgrade; confirm with SME.
Application version intended to be installed as a result of this run (post-install version).
Type of installation performed, such as fresh, upgrade, repair, or fresh against an existing database.
Serialized key-value list of setup choices (features, add-ons, settings) selected during installation.
